CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , we synthesized the low band gap POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers that consist of dialkoxybenzodithiophene ( BDT ) as the donor and N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione ( DTPD ) as the acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| dialkoxybenzodithiophene (BDT) |
| N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione (DTPD) |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material names, as they refer to specific chemical compounds.

Note: In this context, "low band gap" can be considered a material property as it refers to the energy required for an electron to be excited from the valence band to the conduction band in a semiconductor material.
